title: Facile synthesis of propargylamines by metal-free doubly decarboxylative coupling
content:
RSC Sustain., 2024, 2,2626-2631
DOI: 10.1039/D4SU00258J, Paper
Open Access
Â  This article is licensed under a Creative Commons Attribution-NonCommercial 3.0 Unported Licence.
Junduo Hu, Xiaofan Shi, Liliang Huang, Rongkang Zhang, Huangdi Feng
A sustainable and catalyst-free strategy has been developed for the synthesis of propargylamines by a three-component doubly decarboxylative coupling reaction.
